input.sentences: [female] would not smile no matter what i did .
i let her run around outside to get a smile out of her .
[male] had no problem smiling for the camera .
[male] held down his chair while i took pictures of the kids .
[female] and grandpa spent some time together in the hammock .
output.sentences: My little sister has the cutest smile.
She is especially cute when she runs and smiles.
She and my brother have the best smile when a camera is involved.
This year they get pictures with santa hope they smile good then.
We are going to take pictures swinging in a hammock.
